org.aprestos.code.bok.gui.utils.MnemonicAndAcceleratorManager
Class MnemonicAndAcceleratorManager

java.lang.Object
  org.aprestos.code.bok.gui.utils.MnemonicAndAcceleratorManager.MnemonicAndAcceleratorManager

public class MnemonicAndAcceleratorManager
extends java.lang.Object

MnemonicAndAcceleratorManager is a helper class for translating accelerators and mnemonics specified in a properties file.
